get_integer: This creates a pop-up window showing a custom message, with a button labelled "Ok", and prompts the user to input an integer value. The function will return the typed in integer, or the default value if nothing has been entered.
NOTE: This function is for debug use only on Desktop targets, but is deprecated on all other targets.
The string to show in the pop-up message.
The default value in the text box.
The above code will display a message prompting the user to select a level for testing. The return value will be stored in the global variable "global.level".
